mapper.select:
SELECT TSPR.ID, TSPR.RULETYPE, TSPR.RULE, TSPR.STATE, TSPR.SERVICETYPE FROM RU_RULE_DEF TSPR WHERE
AND TSPR.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RU_RULE_DEF ( ID, RULETYPE, RULE, STATE, SERVICETYPE ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{ruleType}, #{rule}, #{state}, #{serviceType} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM RU_RULE_DEF TSPR WHERE
AND TSPR.ID = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE ru_rule_def TSPR
RULETYPE = #{ruleType,javaType=java.lang.String},
RULE = #{rule,javaType=java.lang.String},
STATE = #{state,javaType=com.tx.component.rule.model.SimplePersistenceRuleState},
SERVICETYPE = #{serviceType,javaType=java.lang.String},
WHERE TSPR.ID = #{id}
